attributes.additional_details: To help bring down prices of everything to help with the cost of living
attributes.background: Cut VAT on everything to help all with cost of living

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Cut the standard VAT rate from 20% to 5%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617044

VAT Complete Removal: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614072
